About

This is a simple Jekyll theme. You can find out more info about customizing your Jekyll theme, as well as basic Jekyll usage documentation at jekyllrb.com. Plus, you can find a lot of themes at jekyllthemes.org

You can find the source code for this theme at: jekyll-simple
